name: Pinata Treats
description:
This is a (maybe?) innocent game about collecting candy from pinatas in a bullet hell environment.

TW: Contains blood and gore and may be disturbing for some players.

Steven Le: Designer,  Pixel Artist, Programmer, Narrative

Joseph Schinnerer: Sound Artist  

Third-Party Assets: Fonts from https://www.dafont.com/vcr-osd-mono.font and https://www.fontspace.com/homicide-effect-font-f2377
